SELECT f.id, f.code, f.title, f.work_type, f.status, f.source, f.urgent_status, f.submit_user, f.receive_user, f.finish_user, f.submit_time, f.talking_time, f.finish_time, f.finish_remark, f.remind_status, m.machine_code AS machine_code, CONCAT(IFNULL(ft.name,''),' ',f.remark) AS remark FROM inno72_check_fault f LEFT JOIN inno72_check_fault_type ft ON ft.CODE = f.type LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = f.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id
WHERE 1=1 and f.status =#{status} and f.work_type =#{workType} and f.source =#{source}
and ( f.submit_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} )
and ( f.finish_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} )
and ( m.machine_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' or f.finish_user LIKE '%${keyword}%' or f.submit_user LIKE '%${keyword}%') and 9=9 ORDER BY f.submit_time DESC

SELECT f.code, m.machine_code AS machine_code, CASE WHEN f.work_type = '1' THEN '故障' WHEN f.work_type = '2' THEN '报警' WHEN f.work_type = '3' THEN '补货' WHEN f.work_type = '4' THEN '其它' WHEN f.work_type = '5' THEN '自动补货' END AS work_type, CASE WHEN f.source = '1' THEN '巡检上报' WHEN f.source = '2' THEN '运营派单' WHEN f.source = '3' THEN '报警派单' WHEN f.source = '4' THEN '系统派单' END AS source, CASE WHEN f.status = '1' THEN '待接单' WHEN f.status = '2' THEN '处理中' WHEN f.status = '3' THEN '已完成' WHEN f.status = '4' THEN '已确认' WHEN f.status = '5' THEN '已关闭' END AS status, CASE WHEN f.urgent_status = '1' THEN '日常' WHEN f.urgent_status = '2' THEN '紧急' END AS urgent_status, CONCAT(IFNULL(ft.name,''),' ',f.remark) AS remark, f.submit_time, f.submit_user, f.talking_time, f.finish_time, f.finish_user, f.finish_remark, f.remind_status FROM inno72_check_fault f LEFT JOIN inno72_check_fault_type ft ON ft.CODE = f.type LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = f.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id WHERE 1=1 and f.status =#{status} and f.work_type =#{workType} and f.source =#{source}
and ( f.submit_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} )
and ( f.finish_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} )
and ( m.machine_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' or f.finish_user LIKE '%${keyword}%' or f.submit_user LIKE '%${keyword}%') and 9=9 ORDER BY f.submit_time DESC

SELECT f.id, f.code, f.machine_id, m.machine_code, f.title, f.work_type, f.status, f.source, f.urgent_status, f.submit_user, f.receive_user, f.finish_user, f.submit_time, f.talking_time, f.finish_time, f.finish_remark, fr.remark AS answer, fr.type AS answerType, fr.name AS answerName, date_format(fr.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS answerTime, CONCAT(#{path},img.image) AS image, img.sort, date_format(img.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS imageTime from inno72_check_fault f LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = f.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_check_fault_remark fr ON fr.fault_id = f.id LEFT JOIN inno72_check_fault_image img ON img.remark_id = fr.id WHERE f.id=#{id} ORDER BY fr.create_time DESC,img.sort
SELECT u.id,u.name FROM inno72_check_user u LEFT JOIN inno72_check_user_machine m ON m.check_user_id=u.id WHERE m.machine_id =#{machineId}
